newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks seen recovering on return of buyers.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks seen recovering on return of buyers.

text.p: Retail and institutional buying should prompt a recovery of Dhaka stocks when trading resumes on Sunday after the weekend, brokers said.
"Investors may return, lured by prices which suffered in the past week," said broker Moshtaque Ahmed.
Brokers said shares in the pharmaceuticals, leather and cement sectors might attract buyers.
The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) all-share price index lost 3.44 points or 0.32 percent to 973.13 on turnover of 35.2 million taka on Thursday. -- Dhaka Newsroom +880-2-506363
